item.title: Drecom launches ‘Are you hungry?’ new title teaser website
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/drecom-launches-are-you-hungry-new-title-teaser-website

Information to be announced on January 15.

Drecom has opened a teaser website for a new game title, teasing new information to be announced on January 15.

The website, titled “Are you hungry?,” features a wilted tree and a little bird-like character, as well as the text, “Let’s go find creatures that have spread all around the world!”

Official Twitter accounts were also opened in both English and Japanese, featuring additional artwork and a pinned tweet that warns pushing the button will cause a “terrifying creature” to escape.
